mapper.select: select /** AdmCnt.selectAll */ CNT_CD, CNT_NM, NTN_NM, PHN_CD, cre_usr_id, cre_dt, upd_usr_id, upd_dt from ADM_CNT
mapper.insert: insert /** AdmCnt.insert */ into ADM_CNT( CNT_CD, CNT_NM, NTN_NM, PHN_CD, cre_usr_id, cre_dt, upd_usr_id, upd_dt ) values( #{cntCd}, #{cntNm}, #{ntnNm}, #{phnCd}, #{createUser}, sysdate, #{updateUser}, sysdate )
mapper.update: update /** AdmCnt.update */ ADM_CNT set CNT_CD = #{cntCd}, CNT_NM = #{cntNm}, NTN_NM = #{ntnNm}, PHN_CD = #{phnCd}, upd_usr_id = #{updateUser}, upd_dt = sysdate where 1 = 1 and CNT_CD = #{cntCd}

update /** AdmCnt.updateWithMap */ ADM_CNT set
CNT_CD = #{cntCd},
CNT_NM = #{cntNm},
NTN_NM = #{ntnNm},
PHN_CD = #{phnCd},
upd_usr_id = #{updateUser}, upd_dt = sysdate where 1 = 1 and CNT_CD = #{cntCd}
mapper.select: select /** AdmCnt.selectByKey */ CNT_CD, CNT_NM, NTN_NM, PHN_CD, cre_usr_id, cre_dt, upd_usr_id, upd_dt from ADM_CNT where 1 = 1 and CNT_CD = #{cntCd}
mapper.delete: delete /** AdmCnt.delete */ ADM_CNT where 1 = 1 and CNT_CD = #{cntCd}
